description.plain:
Jordan Kyle Lanier Thorpe, born December 29, 1989, better known as Pardison Fontaine (“Pardi”), is an American rapper and songwriter who is from Newburgh, NY. His 2018 single “Backin' It Up” featuring American rapper Cardi B has peaked at number 40 on the US Billboard Hot 100(https://www.billboard.com).

He has also co-wrote songs with artists, such as Kanye West, Cardi B, NeYo, and Adele.

His highly anticipated album “UNDER8ED” dropped Friday, November 15th, 2019. He recently released videos for hit singles “Peach” ft. City Girls' owner Yung Miami. “Shea Butter” which samples “Shimmy Shimmy Ya” by the late Ol Dirty Bastard is an instant crowd favorite.)"

body.plain:
Jordan Kyle Lanier Thorpe, born December 29, 1989, better known as Pardison Fontaine (“Pardi”), is an American rapper and songwriter who is from Newburgh, NY. His 2018 single “Backin' It Up” featuring American rapper Cardi B has peaked at number 40 on the US Billboard Hot 100(https://www.billboard.com).

He has also co-wrote songs with artists, such as Kanye West, Cardi B, NeYo, and Adele.

His highly anticipated album “UNDER8ED” dropped Friday, November 15th, 2019. He recently released videos for hit singles “Peach” ft. City Girls' owner Yung Miami. “Shea Butter” which samples “Shimmy Shimmy Ya” by the late Ol Dirty Bastard is an instant crowd favorite.)"

songs.full_title: Backin' It Up by Pardison Fontaine (Ft. Cardi B)
songs.title: Backin’ It Up

description.plain:
Teaming up with rapper and hitmaker, Cardi B, Pardison Fontaine released his hip-hop track, “Backin' It Up”. It is the first song on which they both rap together, however, it should be noted that this is not the first time that Fontaine and Almanzar have worked on music together, since the two are good friends.

Evidence of their past collaborations can be found on tracks from Cardi’s debut album, Invasion of Privacy—such as her hit single “Bodak Yellow”—as well as an old video of the pair partying prior to her rise to fame, which indicates their friendship.

Initially, the song was teased at the 2018 Video Music Award afterparty, which was attended by Cardi herself and, ultimately released in early September of that year. The accompanying video features Pardi hanging around at a pizzeria and dimly lit dancefloor, where the Bronx-raised rapper joins him, too.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hDfsD6G8E_g

songs.embed_content: Read “Backin' It Up” by Pardison Fontaine on Genius

songs.title: UNDER8ED

description.plain: UNDER8ED is the final song off Pardison Fontaine’s sophmore record, “UNDER8ED”. In the song, Pardison raps about the struggle to become famous and is singing to a girl that he likes. Brent Faiyaz even helped write it

songs.embed_content: Read “UNDER8ED” by Pardison Fontaine on Genius

body.plain: UNDER8ED is the final song off Pardison Fontaine’s sophmore record, “UNDER8ED”. In the song, Pardison raps about the struggle to become famous and is singing to a girl that he likes. Brent Faiyaz even helped write it

10 ContributorsUNDER8ED Lyrics[Intro]
Yeah
Let's do some real shit
Some for real shit
Look

[Verse 1]
Girl, you lookin' like the '90s Nia Long, a product of your mom
The girl in high school that every guy was sleepin' on

We don't need all them distractions

Girl, God damn, you underrated
If I wrote you a love letter I would need a hundred pages
Fifty to thank you exes and niggas who didn't make it
Boys who had they shot but missed and didn't take it
God damn, you underrated

Ayy, word

Hey, ayy, look

Yeah, you underrated

Yeah, get your coin, word (Look)

[Verse 4]
You got bills that you payin', DMs you ignorin'

And you leave the crib at eight, get back four in the mornin'
In a Honda right now, but I could see you in that foreign

[Verse 5]
You see hoes bein' flown, you thinkin' it must be nice
But you ain't goin' nowhere if you ain't bookin' the flight, right?
That's underrated, look
You know you look good in your skin and you comfortable
You could be just like them bitches if you wanted to

[Verse 6]
You want the bag, not a bag
These bitches don't get that
Was down for a minute but stay tuned for the get back
Girl, you underrated
You more than your current situation and where you live at
In the gym every day, you workin' to get your shit back
That's underratedEmbed
